name: Hôtel Le Dauphin
address: 28 Avenue General De Gaulle, 06500 Menton, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Hôtel Le Dauphin is located on the beachfront in Menton, just 300 metres from the town centre. It offers free WiFi throughout and air conditioning in each room. Guest rooms at Hôtel Le Dauphin are equipped with a TV and an en-suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private balcony with a sea view. Buffet breakfast is served each morning on the flowered terrace or in the Dauphin’s breakfast room. A continental breakfast can also be served to the guest rooms. A restaurant is available on site. Hôtel Le Dauphin is a 15-minute drive from Monaco. Nice Cote d’Azur Airport is a 30-minute drive from the Dauphin and the Italian border is 2 km away. An airport shuttle service is available at an extra cost and upon prior reservation.
